content.html:
I'm implementing your Plugin in my website, but it doesn't seem to honour my openid.server and openid.delegate headers. Any suggestions?
Hmm, I know that it respects delegation in most cases since that is what I use here. What is the OpenID it's not honoring? The one you just logged in with here (http://www.ende-der-vernunft.org/MyID.php)? Hmm, doesn't look like you have it activated right now, so I can't test it to see if it honors my delegated ID.
